name: dark
description:
A template with a dark color scheme. It has the same features as the "Base" template and can be used for any purpose.

The template generates tabular applications that may feature an agenda, a generic purpose list, an news page with RSS content, photos and videos gallery and a static about page.

The template detects the type of datasources set in the configuration settings and adjusts the available tabs accordingly. For instance, the template displays a schedule view when it detects an ical datasource, a news page when it detects RSS content and a generic purpose list if the datasource is a standard spreadsheet.

main.title: Main tabs
main.description: Up to 6 tabs. Main datasource types supported: ical, photos, videos, RSS, spreadsheets and status messages.
